channel.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
channel.description:
I'm currently making a gun, it's my first one (Never tried making one before)
I only have the main part so far XD
Refrence Picture
[img]http://www.the-blueprints.com/blueprints-depot-restricted/weapons/rifles/automatic_assault_rifle-25134.jpg[/img]
3ds Picture
Updated
[img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/2853/gunstart.png[/img]

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:40, topic:363863”][quote author=Frell link=topic=460101.msg3376879#msg3376879 date=1287693859]

or maya, maya is awesome.
but i would also have to agree with tribb, the graphite modeling tools are INSANE

Maya is directed towards movies and animation, while Max is geared towards the actual modeling and texturing aspect of games.
[/quote]Maya is also very good for character modeling.[/quote]
This also, Call of Duty uses maya for character modeling. It really doesnt matter much anymore, after autodesk bought maya they’re pretty much the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:29, topic:363863”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=460101.msg3371271#msg3371271 date=1287258904]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=460101.msg3371086#msg3371086 date=1287245042]

Holy crap, why so many poly’s depthways? I see no reason.
[/quote]he tessellated the shit outta it.

Yup
[/quote]Can you select loops in 3ds? because that would be usefull to get rid of them, ya know?[/quote]
Make sure your object is an editable poly and not an editable mesh and select the edge you want to loop around and then hit the loop button. To remove the loop without distorting the mesh just press backspace when its selected.

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

runewings317:

What do guns have to do with RSPS… But it’s nice I guess

Ummm, do you know anything about RSPS? Do you actually think a 10k polygon model is going to fit in an RSPS? But thanks btw, I guess…

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:30, topic:363863”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=460101.msg3371634#msg3371634 date=1287276500]

[quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=460101.msg3371271#msg3371271 date=1287258904]

Holy crap, why so many poly’s depthways? I see no reason.
[/quote]he tessellated the shit outta it.

Yup
[/quote]Can you select loops in 3ds? because that would be usefull to get rid of them, ya know?

You can, but that’d also delete all the polygons either side.
I guess you could just create polygons again where you deleted.[/quote]
i guess thats where maya is good, it deletes the loop, and connects the faces that it removed (i might explain in more detail later)

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Tribbinator:

Why dont you sub-d model h1? On guns its useful, btw, how did you go about creating this?

If I didn’t tesselate the model it would be like 1/20th the polygons, and it kept rising as I built more off it, mainly I extruded the model XD

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:18, topic:363863”]eeehh, PLEASE remove some of the polys in the barrel, thats the one thing that irks me about this model, its un-needed detail, and when you bake this to a texture (im hoping ur doing that next) you will see how many polys you can remove, xD
im a slightly poly sencitive atm (my latest models never exceed 1k polys) and lookin at that, you are keeping the wire clean, wich is a good sign xD[/quote]

How many times do I need to say that I didn’t do it to any set limit… XD

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

eeehh, PLEASE remove some of the polys in the barrel, thats the one thing that irks me about this model, its un-needed detail, and when you bake this to a texture (im hoping ur doing that next) you will see how many polys you can remove, xD
im a slightly poly sencitive atm (my latest models never exceed 1k polys) and lookin at that, you are keeping the wire clean, wich is a good sign xD

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

tubefish:

i have to ask one thing. how do you know how many segments to put when making a model?

Just start with a part of the model that can go either way, then just extrude and edit it how you need to

I seriously obliterated the poly count XD but I didn’t set myself a goal of polygons so it doesn’t matter anyway

Added the magazine

Read full topic
